title: Quick Mysteries
description: A gruesome murder scene. Will the cops find out who did it? Oh, there he is. These mysteries get solved quick.
quote: I killed her. Hereâ€™s the weapon and cuff me, thank you very much.
altHero: a Robert Stack-like host in a tan trench coat
